name: FiM++ Source Code File
summary: Source code file written in FiM++, an esoteric programming language based on the My Little Pony cartoon series; uses the form of a written letter to define classes (e.g., Dear Princess Celestia: Letter One followed by other statements); similar to other humorous programming languages such as LOLCODE ( .LOL files).

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
